thread.section_title: Truecar Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Truecar | truecar.com
thread.title: Julie Lytell

author: Julie Lytell
title: Julie Lytell
text: Truecar.com is an invaluable resource in the car buying process. It brings the dealers to you, provides useful information, keeps all of your research, savings certificates, dealers, and inventory searches in one place. Literally, you can do as much or as little as you prefer to find the car you want, see what others have paid for that configured vehicle, prequalify for credit, apply for credit, value a trade, and be communicating with a sales professional by email/text/phone before ever stepping foot into the dealership. By using this free service, it be as easy as making an appointment for a test drive, sign, and drive away in your new car. I will never purchase a car without it. Thank you for providing such an incredible service. Highly recommend. Lots of time and money saved.
